languages.text: {n}Ни один мускул не двигается на лице проктора.{/n} "Все так, Вольный Торговец. Еще нас учат, умирая, падать так, чтобы не мешать идущим следом. В качестве более вещественной благодарности примите "Бессердечный". Я обещал вам корабль — вот он".

{n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."
languages.original_text: {n}Ни один мускул не двигается на лице проктора.{/n} "Все так, Вольный Торговец. Еще нас учат, умирая, падать так, чтобы не мешать идущим следом. В качестве более вещественной благодарности примите "Бессердечный". Я обещал вам корабль — вот он".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. We are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of anyone walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

{n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

languages.text: {n}El rostro del Procurador es tan pétreo como de costumbre.{/n} «Tiene toda la razón, Comerciante, aunque también nos enseñan a caernos muertos de forma que no impidamos el paso a los que vienen detrás de nosotros. Permita que le presente la Desalmada como un agradecimiento más tangible. Le prometí una nave: aquí la tiene».
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del Procurador es tan pétreo como de costumbre.{/n} «Tiene toda la razón, Comerciante, aunque también nos enseñan a caernos muertos de forma que no impidamos el paso a los que vienen detrás de nosotros. Permita que le presente la Desalmada como un agradecimiento más tangible. Le prometí una nave: aquí la tiene».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的表情一如既往地冷漠。{/n}“你的话完全正确，行商浪人。不过，他们也教会了我们如何死在合适的地方，不要让我们的尸体阻碍身后战友的脚步。作为答谢，请允许我将无心号送给你。我答应过会给你一艘飞船作为谢礼，就是这艘。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的表情一如既往地冷漠。{/n}“你的话完全正确，行商浪人。不过，他们也教会了我们如何死在合适的地方，不要让我们的尸体阻碍身后战友的脚步。作为答谢，请允许我将无心号送给你。我答应过会给你一艘飞船作为谢礼，就是这艘。”

languages.text: {n}Le visage du proctor reste de marbre.{/n} « Vous avez tout à fait raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Encore que, on nous apprend aussi à tomber raides morts de telle sorte que nos cadavres ne gênent pas le passage de ceux qui nous suivent. Permettez que je vous offre le Sans-Cœur en guise de remerciement plus tangible. Je vous ai promis un vaisseau, et je n'ai qu'une parole. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du proctor reste de marbre.{/n} « Vous avez tout à fait raison, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Encore que, on nous apprend aussi à tomber raides morts de telle sorte que nos cadavres ne gênent pas le passage de ceux qui nous suivent. Permettez que je vous offre le Sans-Cœur en guise de remerciement plus tangible. Je vous ai promis un vaisseau, et je n'ai qu'une parole. »

languages.text: {n}代理人の顔は相変わらず無表情である。{/n}「あなたの言う通りです、ローグトレーダー。しかし、私たちは後ろを歩く者の道を妨げることなく死ぬ方法も教わります。より分かりやすい感謝の印として、ハートレスをあなたに提供することを許してください。あなたに船を約束しました。これがその船です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}代理人の顔は相変わらず無表情である。{/n}「あなたの言う通りです、ローグトレーダー。しかし、私たちは後ろを歩く者の道を妨げることなく死ぬ方法も教わります。より分かりやすい感謝の印として、ハートレスをあなたに提供することを許してください。あなたに船を約束しました。これがその船です」

languages.text: {n}Üsteğmen'in yüzü taş kesiliyor.{/n} "Çok haklısınız Hür Tacir. Cesetlerimiz arkamızdan gelenlere engel olmayacak şekilde can vermeyi de öğrendik. Size daha somut bir teşekkür ifadesi olarak Taşkalp'i sunmama müsaade edin. Size söz verdiğim üzere geminizi buyurun."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Üsteğmen'in yüzü taş kesiliyor.{/n} "Çok haklısınız Hür Tacir. Cesetlerimiz arkamızdan gelenlere engel olmayacak şekilde can vermeyi de öğrendik. Size daha somut bir teşekkür ifadesi olarak Taşkalp'i sunmama müsaade edin. Size söz verdiğim üzere geminizi buyurun."

languages.text: {n}Der Proktor verzieht keine Miene.{/n} "Ihr habt völlig recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Allerdings lernen wir auch, zu sterben, ohne den nachfolgenden Einheiten im Weg zu liegen. Gestattet mir nun, Euch die Heartless als Zeichen unseres Dankes zu übergeben. Ich habe Euch ein Schiff versprochen ... hier ist es."
languages.original_text: {n}The Proctor's face is stony as ever.{/n} "You are absolutely correct, Rogue Trader. Though, we are also taught how to drop dead without our bodies cluttering the path of those walking behind us. Allow me to present the Heartless to you as a more tangible show of thanks. I promised you a ship — this is it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Proktor verzieht keine Miene.{/n} "Ihr habt völlig recht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Allerdings lernen wir auch, zu sterben, ohne den nachfolgenden Einheiten im Weg zu liegen. Gestattet mir nun, Euch die Heartless als Zeichen unseres Dankes zu übergeben. Ich habe Euch ein Schiff versprochen ... hier ist es."
